mapper.select: select distinct tagName from tag where pinName = some ( select pinName from Pin where uploader = #{user_id});
select tagName, count(pinName) as count from ( select * from tag where pinName = some ( select pinName from Pin where uploader = #{user_id})) subQuery group by tagName
mapper.delete: delete from tag where tag.tagid = some ( select tagid from (select * from tag) tt inner join (select pinName from pin where uploader =#{map.user_id}) p on p.pinName = tt.pinName where tag.tagName = #{map.tagName})
